title: Anejo Highball Recipe
full_text:
Anejo Highball Recipe
Close
Jump to recipe
Prep
5 mins
Total
5 mins
Cook Mode
(Keep screen awake)
Ingredients
1 1/2
ounces
aged
rum
1/2
ounce
orange curacao (or
Grand Marnier
)
1/4
ounce
fresh
lime juice
2
ounces
chilled
ginger beer
2
dashes
Angostura
bitters
Directions
Combine rum, curacao, lime juice and bitters in a highball glass. Stir to combine and fill glass with ice; top with ginger beer. Garnish with a lime wheel and an orange slice.
Rum
